members.name: StorageQuota.supportedTypes
members.description: Returns a list of the available storage types.Â

members.name: StorageQuota.queryInfo
members.description: Returns a StorageInfo object containting the current data usage and available quota information for the application.

members.name: StorageQuota.requestPersistentQuota
members.description: Requests persistent storage for the requesting application and returns a Promise to an instance of StorageInfo. There is no guarantee that the requested space will be granted by the user agent.
